<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_wsd_rsv_reservation</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_wsd_rsv_reservation">source=exchange^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate reservation on blocked location</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
if (!gs.nil(current.block_reference)) return;
var blocLoc = new sn_wsd_core.WPBlockLocationUtils().isLocationBlocked(current.location.getRefRecord(), current.start, current.end); if (blocLoc.isBlocked) { var userMail = String(current.core_rsv_opened_by.email); var userName = String(current.core_rsv_opened_by.first_name); gs.eventQueue('sn_wsd_rsv.notify_blocked_location', current, userMail, userName); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-02-01 11:12:15</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2f6a9a71eb422010c5adfdfc9c5228a6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate reservation on blocked location</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2f6a9a71eb422010c5adfdfc9c5228a6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-23 09:10:35</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2f6a9a71eb422010c5adfdfc9c5228a6"/> </record_update>
